div.head: 熱油火灼
div.div: scorching by hot oil and fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: scorching by hot oil and fire

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tang huo shang 湯火傷 , harm caused by boiling water and fire. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry dan shen 丹參 quotes Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 熱油火灼 , 除痛生肌 , “For scorching by hot oil and fire : It removes the pain and lets muscles grow”.
